author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-3259. Makes failure to read system properties due to a
security manager non-fatal. Contributed by Edward Yoon.

author: rfeng
msg: Add a test case for XMLDocumentStreamReader to be able to wrap an element-braketed XML fragment

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-3419. Fixes TestFsck to wait for updates to happen before
checking results to make the test more reliable. Contributed by Lohit Vijaya

author: doll
msg: Refactored the test data setup for all of the restful large tests. This makes the tests a little cleaner although there seems to be too much logic in the mock classes now. I hope to pull that out into more reusable non-test classes later on.
Also started to test all of the person fields to up our test coverage. More field testing coming...
